page.title: 09CLUBS IN BIRSTALL
page.content: Many of the social and recreational needs of Birstall and the surrounding area are served by{Birstall Community {College}which shares the campus with Longslade School and Stonehill High School. A directory of facilities,{"What's {Where in Birstall"}has been published by Birstall Community College. An idea of the current local activities is found on the library notice board: Scouts and Guides, Swimming Club, 5 Keep Fit Health and Diet Clubs, Archery, Girls Venture Corps, Air Training Corps, Local History Society, Friends of The Earth, National Housewives Register, Young Wives, Computer Users Club, Rock (music) Workshop and a Coffee Morning in aid of Senior Citizens. Advice if you've left home and a Bereavement Visit Scheme were also advertised.
